author: brane
msg: Make the test scripts a bit more generic and consistent.

author: brane
msg: Make the FAIL reports to svn-breakage smaller by sending the test.log

author: maxb
msg: Work around weird test failures on Windows. Patch by Russell Yanofsky.
Changed command line used to start cvs2svn on windows.

author: cmpilato
msg: (log_message_receiver): Calculate the baton's path (in the "i was a
child of a changed dir case") as soon as we know it.  This avoids
a compile warning.  Also, APR will tell us the length of the key,
so we don't need to recalculate that.

author: kfogel
msg: (struct write_string_baton, write_string): Remove these now unused bits.
